title: 19: S6E19 – "Silenced Screams" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three spine-chilling tales from authors Nick Carlson, S.R. Underschultz, and M.M. Kelley, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about nightmarish nature, brutal births, and terrifying towns.

                                  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
